thread.title: WATCH: Bryce Aiken breaks down his commitment to Harvard
thread.title_full: WATCH: Bryce Aiken breaks down his commitment to Harvard

author: Jeremy Schneider | NJ Advance Media for NJ.com
title: WATCH: Bryce Aiken breaks down his commitment to Harvard
text:
By Jeremy Schneider | NJ Advance Media for NJ.com on October 08, 2015 2:08 PM View/Post Comments 
Patrick School guard Bryce Aiken called it "the most exciting and stressful process" of his life. But his recruitment has ended, and at the end of the day he was wearing a Harvard Crimson hat. 
Check out NJ Advance Media's exclusive interview with Aiken, in which he explains the recruitment process and how he decided on Harvard. Be sure to check out the full story on Aiken's commitment as well . 
Jeremy Schneider may be reached at jschneider@njadvancemedia.com . Follow him on Twitter @J_Schneider . Find NJ.com on Facebook .
